meanings.sent1: The garbage can had the fumiest smell in the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The skunk's spray was the fumiest thing I had ever encountered.
meanings.sent3: The fumiest smell from the old cheese made everyone in the room wrinkle their noses.
meanings.sent4: The fumiest stench filled the room, making it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent5: The fumiest odor lingered in the air long after the source was removed.

meanings.definition: Full of or smelling like smoke or fumes
meanings.sent1: The kitchen after cooking bacon was the fumiest place in the house.
meanings.sent2: The factory was the fumiest building in the industrial area.
meanings.sent3: The fumiest room in the house was the one where grandpa smoked his pipe.
meanings.sent4: The fumiest air filled the room after the fire was put out.
meanings.sent5: The fumiest smell of smoke clung to his clothes long after he left the bonfire.

meanings.sent1: The fumiest cheese in the fridge made everyone gag.
meanings.sent2: The fumiest garbage bin in the alley attracted flies from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The fumiest smell from the sewer made the whole street hold their noses.
meanings.sent4: The fumiest aroma wafted from the flower shop, but it wasn't pleasant.
meanings.sent5: The fumiest stench filled the room, making it unbearable to stay inside.
